thread.title: The 2018 Volvo XC60 could be the safest Volvo ever
thread.title_full: The 2018 Volvo XC60 could be the safest Volvo ever

author: Andrew Ganz (feedback@highgearmedia.com)
title: The 2018 Volvo XC60 could be the safest Volvo ever
text: If you're familiar with the Volvo XC90, nothing about the Swedish automaker's new, smaller crossover effort will surprise you. That's a good thing, however. With its 2018 XC60, Volvo has scaled down everything about the successful XC90â€”and it has packed in even more technology. Underneath its simple, Scandinavian looks, the XC60 rides on a...
